eu_initiatives: SPC Poland is a member of an Expert Group of the European Union (Focal Points and Short Sea Promotion Centres for Shortsea Shipping and Motorways of the Sea)
organisation_name: BIURO PROMOCJI ZEGLUGI MORSKIEJ BLISKIEGO ZASIEGU (SPC POLAND)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Focal Points and Short Sea Promotion Centres for Shortsea Shipping and Motorways of the Sea#E01080#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1080#Member#C
membership: SPC Poland is the member of the European Shortsea Network, website: www.shortsea.info.
goals__remit: SPC Poland's main task is the promotion of short sea shipping on the national and local level, promotion of the maritime sector in cooperation with other maritime organizations.
